text:
[Verse]
Woke up to colors
Painted sky so blue
Every shade I see
Feels like something new

[Verse 2]
Clouds shaped like wishes
In the sunlight's beam
Floating high and bright
Living rainbow dreams

[Chorus]
Rainbow dreams so high
Touch the wide blue sky
Run and feel the light
In the morning bright

[Verse 3]
Flowers whisper secrets
To the morning dew
Blossoms turn to see
A world all fresh and new

[Verse 4]
Everywhere I wander
Magic in the air
Steps that feel like dancing
With colors I can wear

[Chorus]
Rainbow dreams so high
Touch the wide blue sky
Run and feel the light
In the morning bright
title: Rainbow Dreams
